patthana16.12:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.12:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nakenaci viññeyyo
patthana16.12:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
patthana16.12:1.1_3: nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnavīsati,
patthana16.12:1.1_4: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsati.
patthana16.12:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.12:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nakenaci naviññeyyo
patthana16.12:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
patthana16.12:3.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsati, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsati. (Etena upāyena kenaci naviññeyye ekūnavīsati pañhā kātabbā.)
